Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: OBJECTIVE : To report a case of syndrome of inappropriate anti - diuretic hormone ( SIADH ) secretion associated with desvenlafaxine .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| syndrome of inappropriate anti-diuretic hormone (SIADH) secretion |
| desvenlafaxine |

The two disease entities in the paragraph are "syndrome of inappropriate anti-diuretic hormone (SIADH) secretion" and "desvenlafaxine". SIADH is a condition characterized by excessive release of antidiuretic hormone (ADH) leading to hyponatremia, while desvenlafaxine is a medication used to treat depression.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

| --- |
| syndrome of inappropriate anti-diuretic hormone (SIADH) secretion |

The only clear disease entity in the paragraph is "syndrome of inappropriate anti-diuretic hormone (SIADH) secretion". Desvenlafaxine is a medication and not a disease.
